product_name: Lonely Planet Guides Costa Rica - 11th Edition
long_description: As the eco- and adventure-tourism capital of Central America, Costa Rica holds a place in the dreams of travelers around the globe. Follow this detailed guide to make your dreams a reality.
short_description: As the eco- and adventure-tourism capital of Central America, Costa Rica holds a place in the dreams of travelers around the globe. Follow this detailed guide to make your dreams a reality.
